# <code>from xml</code> for formats

<div class='command-title'>Parse text as .xml and create table.</div>

## Signature

```> from xml```

## Flags

 * ```-h, --help```: Display this help message
## Examples

  Converts xml formatted string to table
```shell
  > '<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?>
